# Krzewina, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship

Krzewina  is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Bisztynek, within Bartoszyce County, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship, in northern Poland. It lies approximately  west of Bisztynek,  south of Bartoszyce, and  north-east of the regional capital Olsztyn.
